title.newValue: Microsoft Teams: Teams Connect in Teams Admin Center (Preview)

description.newValue:
,With Microsoft Teams Connect we are making it easier to collaborate with anyone outside your organization. Admins can manage the Shared channel lifecycle and membership from the Teams admin center.  They can also use a Teams policy to decide who can create shared channels and who can invite external users to a shared channel. This is now available in preview. For updates, check feature 94820.
Preview date: March CY2022
